item.title: Georgia Panel Wants to Investigate Stacey Abrams, Nonprofit

item.title: Casey DeSantis Hints at Run for Fla. Governor
item.description: Casey DeSantis, the wife of sitting Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis, hinted at making a run to replace her husband in 2026.

item.title: Some GOP Hawks Stunned by Trump-Zelenskyy Meeting
item.description: President Donald Trump's meeting with Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy stunned several hawkish Republican lawmakers, reports Axios.
